home.text_base_description: Elegant and light-filled Victorian condo in Pacific Heights. Two bedroom, one bath residence with classic architectural details and newer electric, plumbing, and kitchen. High ceilings, vintage crystal chandeliers, and charming Juliet balcony give this home a sophisticated Parisian feel. East/west exposures and sweeping, curved bay windows fill the home with natural light. Generous storage with primary bedroom walk-in/custom shelving, laundry closet (new W/ D), and custom closet in 2nd bedroom. Bathroom is tastefully updated and accessed from both the primary bedroom and hallway with an additional sink, serving as a perfect powder room for guests. Quiet residential block between Alta Plaza Park, Fillmore shopping/dining, Mollie Stone's & Divisadero Corridor. Three frequent buses downtown and 4 mins to tech bus pickup. Building has completed seismic retrofit & new roof. Dedicated storage in garage. No deeded parking, but 2+ months use of parking pad/year. See 2029Pierce301.com for more.
